mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your dreams come true just because you exist!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I once demanded free first-class tickets because my coffee wasn't the perfect temperature. The airline caved in, upgraded my entire family, and offered me a lifetime supply of their exclusive in-flight coffee. Who knew a little entitlement could lead to such luxurious perks? And yes, my coffee was still too hot.
